decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
REASON:  To comply with the provisions of Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents: Design Statement (Dated 01/06/2022), 2021/001/06 Rev R02, 2023/001/01 (Dated July 2023), 2022/001/02 (Dated September 2023), 2023/002/01 (Dated July 2023, Response to Request for Tree Report, Response to Request for a Flood Risk Assessment, Response to Invalidation Letter, Reasonable Exception Statement, Email from Agent (Dated 21/09/2023).
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

Condition : 3 - Notwithstanding the details shown on the approved drawings and documents, the development hereby approved shall not commence beyond slab/foundation level until samples of the materials (or appropriate specification) to be used in the construction of the external surfaces noted below have been submitted to, and agreed in writing by, the local planning authority:

a) timber frame
b) single ply roofing system

Details shall also be provided on proposed maintenance measures for the aforementioned elements.

The development shall be carried out in accordance with the details so agreed and shall be retained as such thereafter.

REASON: To ensure that the development is carried out to the highest standards of architecture and materials, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the area.
subdivision_of_building: The proposal covers the ground floor unit 3&4. There is a temporary structure being proposed in order to house a seating area for the restaurant. The temporary structure will have lead flashing to new pitched roof, upvc windows and rainwater downpipes, lightweight timber frame with composite decking floor.
description: Single storey front extension to provide enclosed seating area
